[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”4.14.9″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0.5)” custom_margin=”||35px||false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”15px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_line_height_tablet=”” text_line_height_phone=”1.6em” text_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” global_module=”163441″ saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

A powerful song without any lyrics – it helps you to reach the flow state and gives you the perfect flow glow.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Name” _builder_version=”4.14.9″ _module_preset=”22fe5eac-fadd-4b7a-9a95-0f3dc803dfea” header_2_font_size=”25px” custom_margin=”15px||0px||false|false” header_2_font_size_tablet=”25px” header_2_font_size_phone=”20px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_module=”163439″ saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Healthy Inside | Healthy Back

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”4.14.9″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0.5)” custom_margin=”||35px||false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”15px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_line_height_tablet=”” text_line_height_phone=”1.6em” text_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” global_module=”163441″ saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

“Healthy Back” is the first of several mini series for the main theme “Healthy Inside”. He will guide you through exercises for strong and mobile legs, for an open front side, and a strong backside – because all of these components are connected to and will foster your back’s health.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_blurb title=”Young Ho Kim” image=”https://tintyoga.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/young-ho-kim-teaching-smile_quad.jpeg” icon_placement=”left” image_icon_width=”50px” Find Your Flow | Grounding

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.9″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0.5)” custom_margin=”||35px||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”15px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_line_height_tablet=”” text_line_height_phone=”1.6em” text_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

“Flow for Grounding” is part of the “Find Your Flow” series and includes three videos – 10, 20, and 30 minutes – designed to bring you back to the present moment. These practices are perfect for those days when you feel like everything is up in the air or your mind is racing with thought after thought. 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_blurb title=”Ami Norton” image=”https://tintyoga.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/ami-norton-inside-flow-tint-teacher.jpg” icon_placement=”left” image_icon_width=”50px” As you flow through these sequences accompanied by a gentle playlist, your practice will serve as a reminder […]
